dimensions: Warp x Weft: 17.5 x 27 cm (6 7/8 x 10 5/8 in.)
title: Sample
medium:
Medium: silk, cotton
Technique: plain weave with paired wefts
description: Handwoven sample with a variegated yellow and white silk texture. The warp is of off-white silk; the weft is of one off-white silk thread paired with one yellow silk thread.  Narrow plain weave band at top and bottom with undyed cotton wefts.
name: Sample
